DPK1R.RG.summary: AS Ditton pievadkezu rupnica manufactures and sells driving chains in Europe and internationally. It operates through Western and Eastern segments. The company offers roller, motorcycle and snowmobile, automotive, leaf, special, and other chains. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of parts and accessories for motor vehicles; manufacture and repair of fabricated metal products, mechanisms, and equipment; installation of production equipment and devices; sale, maintenance, and repair of motorcycles, accessories, and related parts; and manufacture of metal tanks, reservoirs, and containers. In addition, the company is involved in forging, pressing, stamping, and rolling metals and metallurgy powder; treatment and coating of metals; warehousing and storage business; buying and sale of real estate properties; leasing and building facility management of owned and leased real estate properties; metal constructions; and other activities. The company was formerly known as Joint Stock Company Daugavpils pievadkezu rupnica and changed its name to AS Ditton Pievadkezu Rupnica in January 2002. AS Ditton Pievadkezu Rupnica was founded in 1949 and is based in Daugavpils, Latvia.

KA11R.RG.summary: A/S Kurzemes Atslega 1 engages in the manufacture of hardware for windows and doors, and metal forgings; and metalworking and woodworking activities in Latvia and other European Union countries. It offers hardware for doors and windows, such as door locks and handles, furniture hardware, hinges and gate hinges, padlocks, window hardware, mortise locks, and rim locks. The company is also involved in the provision of metalworking works, which includes stamping, folding, turning, welding and grinding, and milling and sawing of parts; punching and cutting metal sheets, bending of metals, plasma cutting, powder coating, and tempering services; and manufacture of stamping dies and molds, as well as repairing them. In addition, it offers zinc, chrome, and nickel plated coatings; forged metal gates, fences, and handrails for stairs and balconies; CNC turning and milling; aluminum/zinc and plastic casting; and powder painting services. Further, the manufactures and installs wooden panel and frame houses, and mobile and module houses; constructs wooden frame houses, as well as customizes orders for manufacture and installation of houses; and provides perforated plates and various connecting pieces for construction. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1890 and is based in Aizpute, Latvia.

VSS1R.RG.summary: AS Valmieras stikla skiedra produces and trades in fiberglass and fiberglass products. The company offers E, HR, and SiO2 glass products, including chopped strands, single and twisted yarns, textured yarns and fabrics, technical fabrics, composite fabrics, nettings or meshes, needled mats, stitch-bonded mats, textile membranes, and coated and laminated fabrics. Its products are used in raw materials, thermal insulation, smoke and fire protection products, composites, industrial applications, building materials, architecture and design applications, and acoustic solutions. The company sells its products in the European Union, North America, CIS, and other countries. AS Valmieras stikla skiedra was founded in 1963 and is based in Valmiera, Latvia. As of February 18, 2021, AS Valmieras stikla skiedra operates as a subsidiary of Duke I S.Ã  r.l.
